name: Ponfe Notes
description: Notes application, CRUD and filter by Labels. Using the useContext hook to mange the user state and Firebase as no-SQL database and session manager.

name: Basement Challenge
description: Front end challenge, using the design provided in a figma file the tasks were implement a shop cart for the basement swag and store the items in local storage.

name: Black Box Vision challenge
description: Quiz app using the opentdb.com API. Two modes, score by answering 10 questions and an endless were you loose at your first mistake

name: Devoff desafío 5 - Pokedex
description: Using the pokeAPI, mobile application that displays Pokémons in an infinite scroll and a details screen using colors depending the nature of the creature.

name: Time Tracking Challenge
description: Challenge to replicate UI from Front End challenge for desktop and mobile versions.

name: Manage Landing Page
description: Following the designs of the challenge, i've recreate a landig page for this company.

name: Aerolab challenge
description: Redeem your points, see your lasts redeems and add coins to your account.

name: Innovid Challenge
description: Connect to your servers to see they're CPU usage every 5 seconds, you can also turn they off. A css library give us the feel of Windows 98.
